Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

Like-Like had been traveling a far way off course. He started to get tired.=
 He remembered when he was awoken from the slumber he went into when his ma=
ster, his creator, had died. He stayed into it until someone yelled "arise =
Optimus Prime." He thought about that sweet slumber. He had imagined the so=
ng that was sung to him by his master. It made him see some difference betw=
een his old master and Magmatron, but he was too stupid to notice that they=
 were both different. He burrowed deep underground, very deep, deeper than =
he had been since he woke up. He kept traveling towards the base, the tunne=
l avalanching behind him. He kept thinking of good thoughts as he tried to =
find the Destron's base. He eventually got kind of tired. He evntually stop=
ped completely. He was in his big leech thing beast mode, and felt himself =
getting more and more tired. In one quick thought about what he had done si=
nce waking up, he fell asleep once again. Sleep well, Like-Like, the world =
above will stay awake for ya.
~~~~~
Pinsir, on the other hand, had been sta=
ring into the distance as Double Punch had fought his friend Scyther. He st=
arted having deranged thoughts. Thoughts about someone killing him Thoughts=
 about someone killing Scyther. He thought about them so much that they sta=
rted to take over. He started to become his worst enemy, and the worst enem=
y of everyone. He was his best friend and worst enemy now, he was all alone=
 in the fragile little existence of the universe, just waiting for someone =
to snap and destroy all that ever was. Pinsir halucinated. He started firin=
g at someone who wasn't there.

Pinsir: Die, Suukie, you piece of crap!

Pi=
nsir started swinging his fist.

Pinsir: All for one!

He started stabbing =
with a knife.

Pinsir: Die you electric yellow little fart!

Pinsir started=
 panting furiously. He screamed suddenly.

Pinsir: It's not worth it.

(Zar=
dus, I hope you don't mind, I need to get under the limit)

Pinsir set his =
self destruct sequence and laughed. 3, 2, 1, EXPLODE! Pinsir's parts were s=
cattered everywhere. He's dead, Jim...
